name: Eremite Teatime
title: Eremite Teatime
desc: "Join the Eremites and Embrace a Wonderful New Life!"

skills.desc:
If you have multiple characters of the same Elemental Type, then Select 1 Location card from 3 to add to your Hand;
If you have multiple characters that use the same type of weapon, then Select 1 Item card from 3 to add to your Hand;
If you have characters that belong to the same faction, then Select 1 Food card from 3 to add to your Hand.
